  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:clao_es_20070119_2_0020515</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>clao_es_20070119_2_0020515</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">El Bajo Imperio romano (193-476 d.C. )</string>
            <string language="en">The late Roman Empire (192-476 A.D.)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das späte römische Reich (192-476 A.D.)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le défunt empire romain (192-476 A.D.)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O império roman atrasado (192-476 A.D.)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'impero romano ritardato (192-476 A.D.)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η πρόσφατη ρωμαϊκή αυτοκρατορία (192-476 A.D.)</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Epígrafe con un breve texto explicativo del Bajo Imperio con imágenes ilustrativas, una actividad (crucigrama), así como enlaces a glosario de personajes significativos.</string>
            <string language="en">Section including a brief text explaining the late Roman Empire with illustrative images, an activity (crossword) and links to a glossary including important personalities.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Bajo Imperio</string>
            <string language="en">Late Empire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Roma</string>
            <string language="en">Rome</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kapitel einschließlich einen kurzen Text, der das späte 
römische Reich mit illustrativen Bildern, einer Aktivität 
(Kreuzworträtsel) beschreibt und Links einem Glossar einschließlich 
wichtige Funktionseigenschaften.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Section comprenant un bref texte expliquant le défunt 
empire romain avec des images d'illustration, une activité (mots 
croisé) et des liens à un glossaire comprenant des personnalités 
importantes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Seção including um texto breve que explica o império 
roman atrasado com imagens ilustrativas, uma atividade (crossword) e 
ligações a um glossário including personalidades importantes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sezione compreso un breve testo che spiega l'impero romano
ritardato con le immagini illustrative, un'attività (parole 
incrociate) ed i collegamenti ad un glossario compreso le personalità
importanti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τμήμα συμπεριλαμβανομένου ενός συνοπτικού κειμένου 
που εξηγεί την πρόσφατη ρωμαϊκή αυτοκρατορία με τις 
επεξηγηματικές εικόνες, μια δραστηριότητα (σταυρόλεξο) και τις 
συνδέσεις με ένα γλωσσάρι συμπεριλαμβανομένων των σημαντικών 
προσωπικοτήτων.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spätes Reich</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rom</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Défunt Empire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Rome</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Império Atrasado</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Roma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Impero Ritardato</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Roma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρόσφατη αυτοκρατορία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ρώμη</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
